definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)

sentences.english: Decca Recording Co. , rejecting the Beatles, 1962
sentences.chinese: 德克唱片公司，拒绝披头士的评语，1962。

sentences.english: The comments are overwhelmingly disapprovals to my conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 正是这些评语使我惊诧不已。

sentences.english: Read 20 reviews Virgin Mobile PAYG, so a good deal.
sentences.chinese: 阅读20维珍移动评语现收现付，使一个很好的协议。

sentences.english: Many moving comments have been recorded in the visitors' book.
sentences.chinese: 留言簿上记着许多动人的评语。

sentences.english: For this, Chinese famous writer Qian Zhongshu had an excellent moment.
sentences.chinese: 对此，中国著名作家钱钟书先生有一个绝妙的评语。

sentences.english: It may be bar tacking on top of slit if buyer's comment requested.
sentences.chinese: 如果客户评语要求的话，要在叉顶打枣。

sentences.english: Only proffesional developers with experience and former good reviews.
sentences.chinese: 随着经验和良好的评语只有前业余体校开发商。

sentences.english: Now read Jesus' report card to this group of believers in Sardis.
sentences.chinese: 现在请看耶稣对撒狄信徒的评语。

sentences.english: Feature lists are for software sites and magazine reviews.
sentences.chinese: 功能列表是为了给下载站和杂志评语的。

sentences.english: Another person, Syed Akbar Ali, was also charged because he posted a "seditious" comment on the article.
sentences.chinese: 另外一人，则因在网页写了回应评语，同样也被提控。

sentences.english: Accessor's comments are informatic with objective and fair grading, and guidingly.
sentences.chinese: 教师评语内容充实，评分客观公正，有指导性。

sentences.english: Pre-draft exercises will be acknowledged with a check and brief comments.
sentences.chinese: 我会检查草稿前练习并写下简单评语。

sentences.english: Comments should try to remain the advantages of compositions to top students.
sentences.chinese: 评语写作应想方设法永保优等生的作文“优势”。
黑根对这一评语感到很诧异。

sentences.english: That is their unanimous comment on me.
Depending on the comments received, the editor would accept the paper for publication or decline it.
sentences.chinese: 根据同行的审阅评语，编辑将发表论文或者退稿。
